title: Clear day, slow city driving with 12 braking events.
caption: A slow-moving car on a city street with palm trees and a speed limit of 30 mph.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.0 m/s). There are 12 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The video shows a slow-moving car on a city street with palm trees on both sides. The road has two lanes going in each direction, and there are several other cars on the road. The weather is clear, and the sky is blue. There are also a few parked cars on the side of the road. The video shows the car braking frequently, and there are several traffic lights and stop signs along the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is moving slowly because it is obeying the speed limit of 30 mph. The frequent braking events could be due to the presence of pedestrians or other obstacles on the road. The ego vehicle is also changing lanes to avoid congestion and maintain a safe distance from other vehicles. The presence of traffic lights and stop signs indicates that the road is well-regulated, and the ego vehicle is following all traffic rules to ensure safe driving.
